attributes.action: MP's who refuse to accept the EU referendum result should resign.
attributes.background: Act justly upon the mandate and allow us to move forward as directed with dignity, returning to the world stage confidently as one great fair and liberal nation, retaining both the admiration of our sovereignty and historically 'hard-earned' democracy!

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions, and decisions on whether to resign are a matter for individual MPs.
